item.title: AB-6 South - Border Crossing Information
item.description: AB-6 South hours for the border crossing into the United States. U.S.A. Port of Entry - Chief Mountain open 7AM to 10PM.

item.title: AB-6 North at AB-5 - Waterton National Park
item.description: AB-6 North at AB-5 in Waterton National Park. Turn right for AB-5 north; left for AB-6 north/AB-5 south. The directional banners on the shields are bi-lingual.

item.title: AB-5 North/AB-6 South at AB-5/AB-6 Split
item.description: AB-5 North/AB-6 South at AB-5/AB-6 split in Waterton Park. Turn right for AB-6 south; continue straight for AB-5 north.

item.title: AB-6 South Approaching AB-5 - Waterton Lakes National Park
item.description: AB-6 South approaching AB-5 in Waterton Lakes National Park. Turn right for AB-5 south to Waterton Village; straight for AB-6 South/AB-5 North to Cardston and the U.S.A. Border.

item.title: AB-6 South at AB-505
item.description: AB-6 South at AB-505 east to Hill Spring and Glenwood. Continue south on AB-6 south for Waterton Park.

item.title: AB-6 South Approaching AB-505
item.description: AB-6 South Approaching AB-505 in the Municipal District Of Pincher Creek No. 9.

item.title: AB-6 South - To Waterton Park
item.description: AB-6 South - Continue ahead for Waterton Park.

item.title: AB-6 South at AB-507 - Pincher Creek
item.description: AB-6 South at AB-507 East in Pincher Creek.

item.title: AB-6/AB-507 Roundabout - Pincher Creek
item.description: AB-6/AB-507 Roundabout in Pincher Creek. Merge right for AB-6 South.

item.title: Heweston Ave. North at AB-6/AB-507 Roundabout
item.description: Heweston Ave. North at AB-6/AB-507 roundabout in Pincher Creek. Use AB-6 North for AB-3 (Crowsnest Highway); use AB-6 south for Waterton Park; use AB-507 West for Beaver Mines and Castle Mountain.

item.title: Heweston Ave. North Approaching AB-6/AB-507
item.description: Heweston Ave. North Approaching AB-6/AB-507 roundabout in Pincher Creek.

item.title: AB-6 South at AB-507 Junction
item.description: AB-6 South at AB-507 West Junction in a roundabout. Merge right for AB-507 west.

item.description: AB-6 south shield in Pincher Creek.

item.description: AB-3 East at AB-6 South in Pincher Creek.

item.title: AB-3 East Approaching AB-6 South
item.description: AB-3 East Approaching AB-6 South to Pincher Creek and Waterton Park. Continue east on AB-3 for Fort Macleod.

item.title: AB-3 East at AB-22 North
item.description: AB-3 East at AB-22 North junction in the Municipal District Of Pincher Creek No. 9.

item.title: AB-3 East Approaching AB-22 North
item.description: AB-3 East approaching AB-22 North. Use AB-22 north for Longview, Black Diamond, and Turner Valley.

item.description: Distance marker on AB-3 east. Distance to Lundbreck, Cowley, and Pincher Creek.

item.description: AB-3 East approaching Bellvue/Hillcrest communities in Crowsnest Pass.

item.description: Distance marker on AB-3 East. Distance to Lundbreck, Pincher Creek, and Fort Macleod.

item.title: AB-3 East at AB-40 North - Coleman
item.description: AB-3 East at AB-40 North in Coleman. Use AB-40 north for Forestry Trunk Road.

item.title: AB-3 East - Crowsnest Pass
item.description: Entering Crowsnest Pass on AB-3 east.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-43 North - Sparwood
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-43 North in Sparwood. Turn left for BC-43 north to Elkford; continue east on BC-3 for the Alberta Border.

item.title: BC-3 East - Hosmer
item.description: Entering Hosmer (Unincorporated) on BC-3 east.

item.title: BC-3 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-3 east in Fernie. Distance to Sparwood and Lethbridge (Alberta).

item.title: BC-3 East - Fernie
item.description: BC-3 east in Fernie. Turn right on 4th St. for (Fernie) City Centre. Continue east on BC-3 for Sparwood and Lethbridge (Alberta).

item.title: BC-3 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-3 east. Distance to Fernie, Sparwood, and Lethbridge (Alberta).

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-93 South
item.description: BC-3 east at BC-93 south to US Border. Continue east on BC-3 for Fernie and Alberta Border. BC-93 south leaves BC-3 east here.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95 Junction
item.description: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95 Junction. Exit for BC-93/BC-95 north to Invermere and Radium Hot Springs. Continue straight for BC-3 East/BC-93 South to Fernie and Lethbridge (Alberta). BC-93 south joins BC-3 east to Elko.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95
item.description: Approaching BC-3 East/BC-95 North split in 1300 metres. BC-3 East joins BC-93 South to Fernie and Lethbridge (AB). BC-95/BC-93 north to Invermere and Radium Hot Springs.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-95A
item.description: BC-3/BC-95 west to Fernie and Radium Hot Springs at BC-95A to Kimberley and Airport.

item.title: BC-3 East Approaching BC-95A
item.description: Use BC-93/BC-95 north for Fort Steele, Fairmont, and Invermere, approaching BC-95A on BC-3 east.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North Approaching BC-95A
item.description: BC-3 East/BC-95 North approaching BC-95A. Use BC-95A North for Kimberley and (Canadian Rockies International) Airport. Continue on BC-3 East/BC-95 North for Radium and Fernie.

item.title: BC-3 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-3 east. Distance to Cranbrook, Kimberley, and Fernie.

item.title: BC-95 North - Distance Marker For BC-3 West
item.description: Distance Marker For BC-3 West (Crowsnest Highway) on BC-95 north. Distance to Nelson and Creston. Many of the border crossings near the Crowsnest Highway have signs showing distance along the Crowsnest Highway.

item.title: BC-95 North - Port of Kingsgate
item.description: Canada Border Services Agency Port of Kingsgate office on BC-95 north.

item.title: BC-95 North - Welcome To Canada
item.description: Welcome To Canada on BC-95 north. Approaching border inspection at Port of Kingsgate.

item.title: BC-22 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on BC-22 South. Distance to USA Border - 1 km. Border crossing at Port of Frontier is open 24 hours.

item.title: BC-22 South/BC-3B West at BC-22/BC-3B Split
item.description: BC-22 South/BC-3B West at BC-22/BC-3B split. Turn right for BC-3B West to Grand Forks and Castlegar. Turn left for BC-22 South to Spokane USA.

item.title: BC-3B West/BC-22 South - Rossland
item.description: BC-3B West/BC-22 South - Rossland

item.title: BC-3B West at BC-22 - Trail
item.description: BC-3B West at BC-22 in Trail. Turn left for BC-3B West/BC-22 South. Continue straight for BC-22 North. BC-3B west joins BC-22 south to Rossland.

item.title: BC-3B West at BC-22 - Trail
item.description: BC-3B West at BC-22 in Trail. Use BC-22 north to Castlegar and Nelson. Use BC-22 South/BC-3B West to Warfield and Rossland.

item.title: BC-3B West Approaching BC-22
item.description: BC-3B West approaching BC-22 in Trail. Use BC-3B West/BC-22 South for Rossland and Spokane (Washington). Bridge in background of photo is the Columbia River bridge in Trail.

item.title: BC-22 South at BC-3B - Trail
item.description: BC-22 South at BC-3B in Trail. Turn right for BC-22 South/BC-3A West to Rossland/Warfield. Continue straight for BC-3B to BC-22A/BC-3/Trail City Centre/Salmo. BC-3B West joins BC-22A South to Rossland.

item.description: End BC-3A West at BC-3. Use BC-3 West for Castlegar, Grand Forks, and Trail.

item.description: BC-3A West approaching BC-3. Use right lane for BC-3 West/Castlegar. Use left lane for BC-3 East/Weigh Station/Salmo.

item.description: BC-6 South at BC-3A. Turn right for BC-3A west to Castlegar and Trail; turn left for BC-3A east and BC-6 south to Nelson. BC-6 south joins BC-3A east to Nelson.

item.description: BC-3A West/BC-6 North split in South Slocan. Turn right for BC-6 north to Slocan, New Denver, and Nakusp.

item.description: BC-3A West at BC-6 junction in Nelson. Exit right for BC-3A West/BC-6 North/Trail Castlegar.

item.description: BC-3A West/To BC-6/Nelson City Centre Next Right on Nelson St. approaching Anderson St. in Nelson.

item.description: End BC-31 South at BC-3A in Balfour. Turn left for BC-3A East to Creston via Kootenay Lake (Ferry). Continue straight for BC-3A West to Nelson.

item.description: End BC-31 South at BC-3A in Balfour,

item.title: BC-3A West at BC-31
item.description: BC-3A West at BC-31 in Balfour, leaving the Kootenay Lake Ferry. Turn right for BC-31 north to Ainsworth and Kaslo. Turn left for BC-3A west to Nelson.

item.title: BC-3A West - Kootenay Lake Ferry
item.description: BC-3A West approaching Kootenay Lake Ferry. Use left lane for Pilot Bay Road; right lane for Scott Road. Continue in middle lane for the Kootenay Lake Ferry.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-3A - Creston
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-3A in Creston. Turn right to continue east on BC-3.

item.title: BC-3 East at BC-3A North
item.description: BC-3 East at BC-3A North in Creston. Turn left for BC-3A North to Kootenay Lake Ferry; turn right for BC-3 East to Creston and Cranbrook. BC-3A is an alternate route to BC-3 and follows Kootenay Lake and the Kootenay River west before re-joining BC-3 in Castlegar.

item.title: End BC-21 North at BC-3 (To BC-3A)
item.description: End BC-21 North at BC-3 (To BC-3A) in Creston. Turn left for BC-3 West to Salmo and Castlegar. Turn right for (BC-3 East), BC-3A North/Kootenay Lake Ferry.

item.title: BC-21 North at Erickson Road
item.description: BC-21 North at Erickson Road. Turn right for Erickson Road east and BC-3 east. Continue north on BC-21 for BC-3 west.

item.title: BC-21 North Approaching Erickson Road
item.description: BC-21 North approaching Erickson Road in Creston. Use Erickson Road west for BC-3 East/Creston/Cranbrook. Continue north on BC-21 for BC-3 East to Nelson and Castlegar.

item.title: BC-21 North - Think Metric
item.description: Think Metric sign on BC-21 north, just past the Rykerts Port of Entry. 50 MPH = 80 km/h.

item.description: BC-97 South approaching Customs - Port of Oroville. All traffic beyond this sign must report to US Customs.
